law.catch_line: The governing body of one or more counties may establish and maintain a local correctional facility....

text.section: The governing body of one or more counties may establish and maintain a local correctional facility.

section.section: The governing bodies of two or more counties may enter into a written agreement with each other as to allocation of responsibility, construction, operation, maintenance, and appointment of personnel in connection with a local correctional facility.
The State may be a party to an agreement under this subsection.
